page.title: 14NEW HOUSING ESTATES
page.content: Many new houses are being built on the Chilton Hall Estate to the north west of Stowmarket near the A45. It takes about 18 weeks to build a house and they average about 70 houses a year.So far 300 houses have been sold and they plan to build another 400. There is 1 main building firm working on the site and 40 other operatives. There are 15 trades involved in the building. The houses being built range from the Â£Worchester',2 bedroomed semi-detached at 26995 pounds,to the Â£Ambassador',4 bedroomed detached at 58675 pounds. The scheme also includes a play area and a landscaping scheme.A central spine road is also being built for through traffic which will link Bury Road to Onehouse Road.
